## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a3c6b6e1a22a56620b309d722c59897f1e6d2225c56e8faafc1b87beefc26750)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'syns-knox-xss-allwhere' @ 1.0.0 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
